title.native: 2.43 清陰高校男子バレー部
title.english: 2.43: Seiin High School Boys Volleyball Team

description:
High school student Kimichika Haijima moves back to his hometown, Fukui, after causing trouble in the Tokyo Junior High School volleyball club. There, he is reunited with his childhood friend, Yunii Kuroba, who possesses outstanding physical abilities, but is vulnerable under pressure. Haijima, with his overwhelming passion and talent for volleyball, forms an ace combination with Kuroba.

The two enroll at Seiin High School, where they join the volleyball club. Awaiting them are the 163 cm hot-blooded captain Shinichirou Oda, the talented and sharp-tongued vice-captain Misao Aoki and his third-year pair, and second-year students, including Akito Kanno, who is always wearing long sleeves due to his allergy to sunlight.

The newborn team breaks its former shell of weakness and becomes Fukui's rising star. This is a certain team's journey to victory, with a series of fascinating rivals standing in their way.

node.description:
Yousuke Kuroda is a Japanese screenwriter. He is affiliated with Studio Orphee and serves as the inside director (board of directors member).

Kuroda is a prolific writer in the anime industry. Having authored and scripted numerous anime series. Including several original productions. Some of the most notable are Infinite Ryvius, Scryed, Please☆Teacher!, Mobile Suit Gundam 00, and Waiting in the Summer.

In 2003, he won the Individual Award at the 8th Animation Kobe event.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/studio_pablo)

Founder and representative director of Studio Pablo.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/editzhirose)** | **[Website](http://www.editz.jp/)**

**Hirose Kiyoshi** is a Japanese editor and film editor.

__[Website](https://sakiyamasoushi.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/soushiclub) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/soush.i_sakiyama/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBrgK9ZtiUn0Gmn3cruQBkA) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@sakiyamasoushi_official?)__

__Birthplace:__ Hamamatsu City, Shizuoka Prefecture, Japan

__Soushi Sakiyama__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist and composer under record labels Sony Music Label (2020–) and Sony Music Records (2021–), he is also affiliated with the entertainment office Sony Music Entertainment. He has been active as a musician since 2015, where he began focusing on street performances and live events. 

He made his major label debut 6 years later on January 27, 2021, with the album "find fuse in youth". Between his major label debut and his debut as a musician, he also wrote and performed a theme song titled "Awa Mitaku Kagayaite" in the 2019 drama _Heisei Monogatari_ in the second season "Nan Demokaideredo, Kakegae no Nai Shunkan", while also debuting in anime with his ending theme "Undulation" in the show _2.43: Seiin High School Boys Volleyball Team_.
Representative director of [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Board Director at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).
Youko Matsuzaki is a producer at Fuji TV.
